MappingQueue.description: The name of the queue in the LRMS where jobs in this share are submitted

MaxWallTime.description: The maximum wall clock time that a single-slot job can run (seconds)

MaxMultiSlotWallTime.description: The maximum wall clock time that a multi-slot job can run (seconds)

DefaultWallTime.description: The default wall clock per slot assumed by the LRMS if a maximum time is not specified (seconds)

MaxCPUTime.description: The maximum pre-slot CPU time that a job can request (seconds)

MaxTotalCPUTime.description: The maximum amount of CPU time that a job can request across all slots assigned to it (seconds)

MinCPUTime.description: The minimum pre-slot CPU time that a job can request (seconds)

DefaultCPUTime.description: The default CPU time limit assumed by the LRMS if a maximum time is not specified (seconds)

MaxTotalJobs.description: The maximum number of jobs that can be in this Share

MaxRunningJobs.description: The maximum number of jobs that can be running in this Share

MaxWaitingJobs.description: The maximum number of jobs that can be waiting in this Share

MaxPreLRMSWaitingJobs.description: The maximum number of jobs that can be waiting in the Grid layer for this Share

MaxUserRunningJobs.description: The maximum number of jobs that can be running in this Share per user

MaxSlotsPerJob.description: The maximum number of slots that can be allocated to a single job in this Share

MaxStageInStreams.description: The maximum number of streams available to stage files in

MaxStageOutStreams.description: The maximum number of streams available to stage files out

ScheduingPolicy.description: The scheduling policy used by the share - SchedulingPolicy_t (open enumeration)

MaxMainMemory.description: The maximum amount of physical RAM that a job can use (MB)

GuaranteedMainMemory.description: The amount of physical RAM that a job will have available (MB)

MaxVirtualMemory.description: The maximum amount memory (RAM+swap) that a job can use (MB)

GuaranteedVirtualMemory.description: The amount of memory (RAM+swap) that a job will have available (MB)

MaxDiskSpace.description: The maximum disk space that a job can use in the working area (GB)

DefaultStorageServiceID.description: The ID of the default StorageService used to store files

Preemption.description: Whether jobs can be preempted and resumed (no value implies undefined in ExtendedBoolean_t)

ServingState.description: How the Share is currently serving jobs

TotalJobs.description: The total number of jobs in any state

RunningJobs.description: The number of running jobs submitted through Grid or non-Grid interfaces

LocalRunningJobs.description: The number of running jobs submitted using non-Grid interfaces

WaitingJobs.description: The number of waiting jobs submitted through Grid or non-Grid interfaces

LocalWaitingJobs.description: The number of waiting jobs submitted using non-Grid interfaces

SuspendedJobs.description: The number of suspended jobs submitted through Grid or non-Grid interfaces

LocalSuspendedJobs.description: The number of suspended jobs submitted using non-Grid interfaces

StagingJobs.description: The number of jobs staging files before or after execution

PreLRMSWaitingJobs.description: The number of Grid jobs which have not yet been passed to the LRMS

EstimatedAverageWaitingTime.description: An estimate of the average time a job will wait before it starts to execute (seconds)

EstimatedWorstWaitingTime.description: An estimate of the worst-case time a job will wait before it starts to execute (seconds)

FreeSlots.description: The number of slots which are currently available for use

FreeSlotsWithDuration.description: The number of slots which are currently available for use and how long they are available

UsedSlots.description: The number of slots currently in use

RequestedSlots.description: The number of slots needd to execute all waiting and staging jobs

ReservationPolicy.description: The policy used for advance reservation - ReservationPolicy_t
